name: post_system_feeds
description: Execute a synchronous feed sync operation. The response will block until complete, then return the result summary.

flush.description: instruct system to flush existing data feeds records from anchore-engine

sync.description: instruct system to re-sync data feeds

$block: An array of feed sync summaries representing the result of an explicit feed sync operation

$ul: **feed**: The name of the feed synced
**status**: The result of the sync operations, either co
**total_time_seconds**: The duratin, in seconds, of the sync of the feed, the sum of all the group syncs
**detail**: Details structure for additional information about the error if available. Content and structure will be error specific.
